Articles.Content:
For those of you on the forums with a great memory, last week I said I would be filming the winner of a poll for Knievel Kerman's next jump (see here)

But something came up on Friday, that I couldn't resist. The Star Wars Teaser. So instead of filming the jump this weekend, I decided to do this instead.

JOOL WARS: THE FARCE AWAKENS
Please don't post directs to other forum posts, as it clutters things up without adding content to the forum. One thread on a subject is enough.
